Name: Optimize-LunarClient

Parameters.Name: Settings
Parameters.Description: Specify which specific tweak you'd like applying on your profile

Description: Tunes a selected Lunar Client profile to your liking

Name: Optimize-OBS

Parameters.Name: Encoder

KeyValues.NVENC: NVIDIA's Fastest encoder, it lets you record in hundreds of FPS easily
KeyValues.AMF: AMD GPUs/Integrated GPUs encoder, not as good as NVENC but can still get out ~240FPS at most
KeyValues.QuickSync: Intel's GPU encoder, worst out of the three, note this is H264, not the new fancy but slow AV1
KeyValues.x264: Encoding using your CPU, slow but efficient, only use if necessary/you know what you're doing

Parameters.Description: Which hardware type you wish to record with

Parameters.Name: OBS64Path
Parameters.Description: If you've got a portable install or something, pass in the main OBS binary's path here

Description: Tune your OBS for a specific usecase in the snap of a finger!

Name: Set-UpdatesBehavior

Parameters.Name: Behavior

KeyValues.Default: set it back to Windows' Default
KeyValues.Reset: use if broken, re-register DLLs, services and registry entries

Parameters.Description: How you want updates to behave

Description:
Control how Windows Updates behave with three presets,
stolen from ChrisTitusTech's winutil, licensed under MIT
